ComicInfo.Title: That Was No Lady
ComicInfo.Summary: That Was No Lady: Lorelei continues her seduction of Thor. Malekith and the Dark Elves try to capture the Casket of Ancient Winters from its keeper, but the Casket is passed on to his son for protection.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:35:41. [Issue ID 38903]
ComicInfo.Characters: Roger Willis (guest, 1st),Eric Willis (guest, 1st, death),Balder (guest),Thor (feature),Dark Elves (villains),Lorelei (villain),Strother (guest),Sheila Ordway (guest),Miss Blum (guest),Jarvis (guest),Surtur (villain),Silverhoof (Balder's horse, guest),Malekith (villain),Officer Grier (guest)
